ModMetaData.name: Armored Floors
ModMetaData.author: the_codewarrior
ModMetaData.description: Armor plating for your floors to keep those beastly burrowing bugs out of your base. Turns out all it takes is two inches of steel-plasteel composite to keep the pesky critters out!\n\nBuild armored floors on any tile with overhead mountain to avoid infestations. Note that the flooring only prevents the *event* from spawning in a given tile. Bug nests can still appear on armored tiles if an infestation spawns on a nearby unarmored tile (the infestation event can occur on the unarmored tile then spawns nests in a radius around that tile).
